comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Anita Delgado Briones (1890-1962), "the Princess of Kapurthala." She was born in Spain and was modeling, dancing and singing as a young woman; in 1908 she married the Maharaja Sir Jagatjit Singh Bahadur of Kapurthala (they met at a wedding a few years before). Four months later, their son was born. The marriage didn't last, and she spent most of her adult life living in Paris. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anita_Delgado

comment._content: pennylrichardsca: Thanks for the info.  We'll include it next time we update!
